Blog.post: Woohoo, a good day for once. I had a long day that ended with enchiladas. That is pretty much all. talk to later you.

Ok, today was great. I just sat and was a big ass all day. Plus i went for ice cream and got to make fun of some dumb emo blokes. WooYaY! I got to go back into the store. this was cool. I saw the parts of the store that many people don't see. Thank you Sarah.
umm, yes...... Today was actually a really lazy day. i had a water balloon fight. that is about all. talk to you all later.

Today was better than the last few days. i am no longer sick. Kevin and i went to a store to try to fil people, this blew up in our faces. that is about all that happened to me today. talk to you all later.

WOOHOO! another shit hole day. except it was a better shithole day. not as grueling, yet more grueling at the same god damn time. Oh, Shit happens, i guess we all need to learn to live with it or something such as this.

Alrighty, Another day in this shithole called life. I hate it. All that ever happens is bad. Last night sarah and i had a like 2 hour long argument. It was horrible. That is the least of my problems... but i am not posting them yet.
Umm..... i have had a good/bad day. Been sick, but still managing to have my fun. Well that is all i have to say. leave me the hell alone.

Today was good until the point where i reached my house. Before that i played on my dream guitar. then went to laser tag it is usually fun. Then i wernt to the palce of dwelling and my parents treated me like some kind of junkie. I hate that. Then Kevin came over. I am Bored. I think that is all i am to write.

Today i went and saw the most bunk ass movie ever. Aliens Versus Predator. I mean come on. All the other movies of this genre at least give me some kind of a scare. Well if you enjoyed it.....That is too bad. Oh, that and i have to get the glasses soon. Yup. That is all bye bye.

As you all can tell i have been absent for my blogging for a couple of days. This is due to the crappiness of computers. My computer decided to be a bung hole and die on me. It is now re-built and i am back to blogging so, Enjoy.

Woohoo for shitty Blog titles. Jk, I am on my brothers user and this popped up so i put it as my title. Today was ok. I am really sore from marching band. what sucks is that i have another god damned week of it. I am sad though that sarah is not happy anymore. It seems like nothing i do can be or ever will be good enough for her. It is like i am incapable of pleasing Sarah. I am sorry sarah.

Well, yesterday i went to ozzfest. I am really really sunburnt. Like it hurts to think right now. So, i am not going to type too much more. In my opinion Black Sabbath was the only good band that played. I also Got thrown into the mosh pits, They smell like fucking nasty it was gross as shit. But over all it was pretty good.

Alrighty, tonight i stayed at kevin's house. It is fan fucking tastic. We stay up all night and drink lots and lots of energy drinks and mountain dew. It is all good though. well that is all i have to say. Bloggy blog later.
